title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Carefree Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Magical Technology   Nobles   Quirky Characters   Reincarnation   Royalty   Tomboyish Female Lead   Vampires
author: Kurasu Piero
description:
Anne-Sophia, the Princess who remembered her previous life at a young age, as well as her old selfâ€™s intense love of magic, set off to live out her fantasies in this fantasy world.

One day, during a magical mishap, she stumbled upon a scene where her brother Algard was breaking off his engagement to his fiancee, Euphilia.

What nobody could have foreseen is that this strange meeting would end up changing the course of history.>
